original: drag po rnams la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: drag po rnams la sv'ah'a /
translated: To the Rudras, svāhā!

original: brgya byin la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: brgya byin la sv'ah'a /
translated: To Śakra, svāhā!

original: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la sv'ah'a /
translated: To the Lokapālas, svāhā!

original: thams cad la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: thams cad la sv'ah'a /
translated: To all, svāhā!

original: lha rnams la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: lha rnams la sv'ah'a /
translated: To the gods, svāhā!

original: nor rnams la sv'ah'a /🔽ma mo rnams la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: nor rnams la sv'ah'a / ma mo rnams la sv'ah'a /
translated: To the wealth, svāhā!🔽To the mātṛs, svāhā!

original: mtshun rnams la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: mtshun rnams la sv'ah'a /
translated: To the relatives, svāhā!

original: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la sv'ah'a /🔽sa la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la sv'ah'a / sa la sv'ah'a /
translated: To all obstacles and misleaders, svāhā!🔽To the earth, svāhā!

original: dbyangs can la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: dbyangs can la sv'ah'a /
translated: To Sarasvatī, svāhā!

original: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / srin po la sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la sv'ah'a /
analyzed: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / srin po la sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la sv'ah'a /
translated: and all the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, mahoragas, rākṣasas, and so forth, and all the beings belonging to the three realms, svāhā.

original: tshur shog tshur shog /
analyzed: tshur shog tshur shog /
translated: Come, come!

original: dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig /
analyzed: dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig /
translated: Keep your sacred pledge!

original: ku ru ku ru /
analyzed: ku ru ku ru /
translated: Kuru kuru!

original: sa ra sa ra /🔽tishtha tishtha / ha na ha na /
analyzed: sa ra sa ra / tishtha tishtha / ha na ha na /
translated: Sara sara!

original: da ha da ha /
analyzed: da ha da ha /
translated: Tiṣṭha tiṣṭha! Hana hana!🔽Dahanda!

original: pa tsa pa tsa /
analyzed: pa tsa pa tsa /
translated: Pacā pacā!

original: h'um y'um h'um/ tsand'a li /
analyzed: h'um y'um h'um/ tsand'a li /
translated: Hūṃ yūṃ hūṃ! Candāli!

original: ma tang+gi / dombhi ni /
analyzed: ma tang+gi / dombhi ni /
translated: Matangī! Ḍombī!

original: pukka si / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: pukka si / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Pukkasi! Homage to all the tathāgatas!

original: bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig sv'ah'a /
analyzed: bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig sv'ah'a /
translated: May the bases of the secret mantra be accomplished for me, svāhā!

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po dang / lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'jigs sngangs skrag par gyur nas chu shing gi tshal rlung drag @332a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po dang / lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'jigs sngangs skrag par gyur nas chu shing gi tshal rlung drag @332a *//
translated: When the Thus-Gone One had spoken this essence of himself and the essence of all the gods, the entire assembly became frightened, terrified, and alarmed, trembling and shaking like a plantain tree shaken by a strong wind, its roots severed.

original: po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g-yo zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa bzhin du zugs shing zhigs la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du shes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang /
analyzed: po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g-yo zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa bzhin du zugs shing zhigs la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du shes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang /
translated: Their hearts were shattered, as if struck by a vajra stake, and they writhed and sought refuge. Merely by their thoughts, they called out to the Blessed Buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One said to Guhyapati Vajrapāṇi:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: lha'i 'khor 'di slongs shig /
analyzed: lha'i 'khor 'di slongs shig /
translated: raise up this assembly of gods.

original: ngas dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go /
analyzed: ngas dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go /
translated: I will have them uphold this samaya.

original: rig sngags grub 'byor bar byed pa'i snying po la gzhol ba bsgrags so //
analyzed: rig sngags grub 'byor bar byed pa'i snying po la gzhol ba bsgrags so //
translated: I will proclaim the essence that accomplishes the wealth of knowledge mantras.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo //
translated: Having said this, Guhyapati Vajrapāṇi raised the entire retinue of gods with this essence of secrets:

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great Yakṣa general Vajrapāṇi.

original: aom k'i li k'i la /
analyzed: aom k'i li k'i la /
translated: Oṃ kīli kīla!

original: badzra k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: badzra k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /
translated: Vajra kīli kīlaya svāhā.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ni / bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba lags te /
analyzed: 'di ni / bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba lags te /
translated: this is my supreme secret essence,

original: rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lags so //
analyzed: rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lags so //
translated: which accomplishes all knowledge mantras.

original: des ni / bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar mchi'o //
analyzed: des ni / bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar mchi'o //
translated: It will summon me, and without being sent by others, I will come.

original: dbang du mchi'o //
analyzed: dbang du mchi'o //
translated: I will come under control.

original: dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will grant spiritual powers.

original: lung bzhin bgyi'o //
analyzed: lung bzhin bgyi'o //
translated: I will act according to the scriptures.

original: bsrung bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bsrung bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will protect.

original: dpal bskyed par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dpal bskyed par bgyi'o //
translated: I will increase glory.

original: @332b bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par bshig go /
analyzed: @332b bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par bshig go /
translated: I will destroy all obstacles and misleaders.

original: sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will tame all sentient beings.

original: 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig par bgyi'o //
translated: I will destroy all the bhūtas.

original: nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o //🔽sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o // sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: I will remove all diseases.

original: ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ma gtogs so //
translated: Except for the ripening of past karma.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na gnod pa bgyid pa bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis rnam par gtses pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na gnod pa bgyid pa bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis rnam par gtses pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
translated: Blessed One,

original: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar blos rnam par bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa mngon shes dri zhim snang dpal gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to //
analyzed: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar blos rnam par bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa mngon shes dri zhim snang dpal gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to //
translated: when I was practicing great austerities for three incalculably long eons in order to attain this most secret essence, all the harmful obstructors and vighnas afflicted me. At that time, Blessed One, the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Ocean-holding Supreme Holder, who was blazing with the splendor of his super-knowledges and the brilliance of his mind, gave me this protection.

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / bde bas tshim par gyur te /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / bde bas tshim par gyur te /
translated: As soon as the Lord of Secrets Vajrapāṇi spoke this most secret essence, the entire assembly became satisfied with the joy and bliss of meditative concentration.

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so //
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so //
translated: They all abided in the teachings of the Lord of Secrets Vajrapāṇi’s commitments.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable Ānanda,

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

original: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
analyzed: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
translated: you should uphold this Dharma discourse,🔽remember it,

original: chongs shig / lhogs shig /🔽'dzin du chug cig /
analyzed: chongs shig / lhogs shig / 'dzin du chug cig /
translated: recite it,

original: kun chub par gyis shig /
analyzed: kun chub par gyis shig /
translated: and cause it to be mastered.🔽You should also teach it extensively and correctly to others,🔽so that many beings will be benefited for a long time,

original: @333a *// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / des sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa /
analyzed: @333a *// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / des sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa /
translated: and ultimately attain the unsurpassed,

original: chags pa med pa /🔽sgrib pa med pa thob cing rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chags pa med pa /🔽sgrib pa med pa thob cing rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: unattached,🔽and unobstructed wisdom of the Thus-Gone One.”

original: su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang /
analyzed: su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang /
translated: Whoever holds this Dharma discourse, reads it, causes it to be taken up, masters it, teaches it extensively and perfectly to others, makes offerings to it, writes it down,

original: yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: causes it to be written down, recites it, listens to it, and contemplates it, will before long fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro // rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur /
translated: From now until they sit at the site of awakening, they will not fall into the lower realms.🔽They will not be born in low-caste families.

original: dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: They will not be born in poor families.

original: shes rab med pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab med pa yang ma yin /
translated: They will not be without wisdom.

original: ma dul bar ma yin /
analyzed: ma dul bar ma yin /
translated: They will not be undisciplined.

original: tshe thung bar ma yin zhing tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe thung bar ma yin zhing tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not have a short life, and in life after life he will remember his lives.

original: byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ro //🔽thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ro // thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not forget the thought of awakening.🔽He will retain what he has learned.

original: rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will delight in solitude.

original: 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not have a bad retinue.

original: tshig @333b gzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshig @333b gzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be one whose words are accepted and pleasing.

original: skal pa bzang zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skal pa bzang zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will have good fortune and a good body.

original: shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen po dang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen po dang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will have great wisdom, great eloquence, and mastery.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be skilled in pleasing all the Tathāgatas.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be assisted by spiritual friends.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will avoid evil companions.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be skilled in perfecting the perfections.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will become skilled in perfecting all sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas pa la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas pa la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will become endowed with magical powers in vast and limitless buddha-fields.

original: nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Until he sits on the seat of awakening, he will not forget the thought of awakening.

original: tshe 'di nyid la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / rigs sngags 'chang grub pa dang / 'byung po dag dang / gdon gyi tshogs dang / ma mo dang / yi dvags dang / sha za dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / rigs sngags 'chang grub pa dang / 'byung po dag dang / gdon gyi tshogs dang / ma mo dang / yi dvags dang / sha za dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
translated: In this very life, he will be invincible to obstacles, to misleaders, to accomplished mantra-holders, to hosts of bhūta spirits, to grahas, to mātṛkā spirits, to pretas, to piśācas, to gods, to nāgas, to yakṣas,

original: dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: to gandharvas, to asuras, to garuḍas, to kinnaras, to mahoragas, and so on.

original: de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All his karmic obscurations will be purified.

original: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be free from all illnesses.

original: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: except for the ripening of past karma, they will not die.

original: de la rig sngags @334a *//
analyzed: de la rig sngags @334a *//
translated: All the knowledge mantras

original: thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: will be accomplished for them.

original: de la lha thams cad kyang srung zhing sbed pa dang / yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la lha thams cad kyang srung zhing sbed pa dang / yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the gods will protect, conceal, and guard them.

original: de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro; ;'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro; ;'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: All their undertakings will be easy, and they will enter the commitments of all the worldly and transcendent maṇḍalas.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Ānanda said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
translated: what is the name of this Dharma discourse?

original: 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
translated: How should it be remembered?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

original: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
translated: Therefore, you should remember this Dharma discourse as The Teaching of the Cloud of Offerings of All Bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa bskor ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa bskor ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: You should also remember it as The Turning of the Unceasing Dharma Wheel of All Tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /🔽bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: You should also remember it as The Tathāgata’s Skill in the Dharma-dhātu.🔽You should also remember it as The Destroyer of the Entire Māra’s Domain.

original: bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: You should also remember it as The Subjugation of the Māra’s Faction.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: You should also remember it as The Understanding of the Engagement with Dependent Origination.

original: dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: You should also remember it as The Characteristics of the Seal of the Sublime Dharma.

original: rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor @334b dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig thams cad la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor @334b dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig thams cad la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: Also, remember it as The One Who Establishes All Knowledge Mantras, Mandalas, Mudras, and Commitments.

original: lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: Also, remember it as The Miracle of the Samadhi of the Liberation of Vajrapani.

original: rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: Also, remember it as The Dhāraṇī of the Multi-Storied Palace on the Peak of the Great Vajra Mountain.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so //
translated: Then the Venerable Ananda rejoiced in what the Blessed One had said.

original: zhes gsol te mngon par dga' nas cang mi smra bar gyur to //
analyzed: zhes gsol te mngon par dga' nas cang mi smra bar gyur to //
translated: Rejoicing, he became silent.

original: de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /
analyzed: de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /
translated: Then all the bodhisattva mahāsattvas of the fortunate eon, such as Maitreya, and all the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who had gathered from the worlds of the ten directions, such as Vajragarbha,

original: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: and all the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, mahoragas, humans, and non-humans, and the entire assembly, praised what had been taught by Bhagavān Vajrapāṇi.

original: 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble dhāraṇī of the great vajra peak of Mount Meru is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang / dzny'a na siddhi dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur @335a *//
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang / dzny'a na siddhi dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur @335a *//
translated: The Indian abbot Śāntarakṣita and the translator Yeshé Dé of Minyak revised it.

original: zhing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: zhing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
translated: It was translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian abbot Śīlendrabodhi and the great editor-translator Yeshé Dé of Zhuchen, who also corrected the terminology.
